00002 // ewsx.h
00003 // the definition of classes for EWSX
00004 //   - EWSXConnParam - connection parameter
00005 //   - muxEWSX - the EWSX multiplexer
00006 //   - controlEWSX - the EWSX control module
00008 
00009 #ifndef   _EWSX_H_
00010 #define   _EWSX_H_
00011 
00012 #include "inxout.h"
00013 #include "queue.h"
00014 
00015 typedef enum {CBR=1, VBR=2, ABR=3, UBR=4, ABRBRMC=5 } ServiceClassType;
00016 
00017 
00018 // struct for ABR information (from abrmux)
00019 struct  ABRstruct       {
00020         double  ER;             // ER we calculated ourselfs
00021         double  forwER;         // incomming forward ER
00022         double  backwER;        // incomming backward ER
00023         double  CCR;
00024         double  MCR;
00025         int     active;         // TRUE if cell arrived during current AI
00026 };
00027 
00029 // Connection Parameter
00030 // the Parameter of a connection in the EWSX-Switch
00031 // is derived from cell in order to be stored in a queue
00033 class EWSXConnParam : public cell
00034 {
00035 
00036    public:
00037    
00038    EWSXConnParam(int vc): cell(vc) {
00039       vciOK = TRUE;        // no cells are lost in the beginning
00040       vciFirst = TRUE;     // first cell is first of a packet
00041       ServiceClass = UBR;  // Standard is UBR
00042       qLenVCI = 0;            // the queue length
00043       
00044       vtime = 0;           // virtual time
00045       vdelta = 0;          // virtual delta
00046       
00047       epdThreshVCI = 0;    // no conn-spec.EPD (see connect of ewsx multipl.)
00048       clpThreshVCI = 0;
00049       ppd = TRUE;
00050       ReservedBuff = 0;
00051                 
00052       AbrInfo = NULL;
00053       AbrVciData = -1;
00054    };
00055 
00056    int vciOK;           // is a cell of the actual frame (not) lost?
00057    int vciFirst;        // next cell is the first of a frame
00058    
00059    ServiceClassType ServiceClass; // the Serviceclass of this conn.
00060    
00061    int qLenVCI;         // number of cells for this connection
00062    int epdThreshVCI;    // EPD threshold for this connection
00063    int clpThreshVCI;    // threshold for dropping CLP=1
00064    int ppd;             // perform PPD?
00065    uqueue q_vc;         // the queue, where the cells are queued
00066    
00067    double vtime;        // the virtual time
00068    double vdelta;       // the virtual delta of this connection (inverse of the WFQ weight)
00069    int ReservedBuff;    // the buffer reserved for this connection
00070         
00071    ABRstruct* AbrInfo;
00072    int AbrVciData;      // for the backward RM cells, this is the VCI of data
00073 
00074 };
00075 
00076 
00077 
00078 
00079 // ABR Parameter
00080 struct AbrParam {
00081 
00082    tim_typ AI_tim;         // interval (time slots) for ABR rate measuremet
00083    tim_typ CVBR_load_tim;  // interval (time slots) for non-ABR rate measuremet
00084 
00085    unsigned cnt_load_abr;  // counter for ABR cell rate measurement
00086    unsigned cnt_load_cvbr; // counter for non-ABR cell rate measurement
00087 
00088    double Z;               // over / underload indication for ERICA
00089    double Zol;             // Z value in case no ABR bandwidth available
00090    double CVBRRate;        // current non-ABR cell rate
00091    double ABRRate;
00092 
00093    double TargetUtil;      // target utilistaion of output link
00094    double LinkRate;        // output link rate (cells per second)
00095    double TargetRate;      // LinkRate * TargetUtil
00096 
00097    int Nabr;               // number of ABR connections
00098    int Nactive;            // # of currently active ABR connections
00099 
00100    int useNactive;         // TRUE: compute fair share from Nactive
00101                            // FALSE: compute it from Nabr
00102    int binMode;            // TRUE: no ER calculations
00103    int TBE;
00104    int abr_q_hi;           // if crossed upwards, congestion indication
00105                            // is turned on
00106    int abr_q_lo;           // if crossed downwards, indication turned off
00107    int abr_congested;      // TRUE: congestion indication
00108 
00109 }; // struct AbrParam

00113 // EWSX - Multiplexer
00115 class   muxEWSX: public inxout {
00116 typedef   inxout   baseclass;
00117 
00118 public: 
00119    enum
00120    {
00121       keyQueue = 1,
00122       keyLoadABR = 2,
00123       keyLoadCVBR = 3
00124    };
00125 
00126    muxEWSX() : evtLate(this, keyQueue),
00127                ABR_load_evt(this, keyLoadABR),
00128                CVBR_load_evt(this, keyLoadCVBR)
00129    {   
00130 
00131       alarmed_early = FALSE;     // not alarmed
00132       alarmed_late = FALSE;      // not alarmed
00133       
00134       ewsx = NULL;
00135       pqlen = NULL;
00136       qlen_local = 0;
00137       maxbuff = 0;
00138       epdThreshGlobal = 0;
00139       clpThreshGlobal = 0;
00140             
00141       spacTime = 0;
00142       
00143       TimeSendNext = -1.0;
00144            
00145       connected = 0;            // i am not connected at the beginning
00146       CellsPushedOut = 0;
00147       
00148       ReservedBuff = 0;         // all buffer available at the beginning
00149       ReservedBandwidth= 0;     // all bandwidth available at the beginning
00150 
00151       AbrVciLast = -1;
00152       
00153    } // constructor
00154    
00155    struct inpstruct
00156    {
00157       data *pdata;
00158       int inp;
00159    };
00160    
00161    int ninp;            // # of inputs
00162    int max_vci;         // number of VCI
00163    
00164    event evtLate;       // event for the late() method (called if arrival)
00165    event ABR_load_evt;  // timer for measuring current ABR cell rate
00166    event CVBR_load_evt; // timer for measuring current non-ABR cell rate
00167 
00168    uqueue q;            // the sort queue
00169    uqueue q_abrrm;      // ABR RM Cells
00170 
00171    unsigned int *lost;     // one loss counter per input line
00172    unsigned int *lostVCI;  // loss counter per VC
00173    unsigned lossTot;       // total losses
00174    
00175    inpstruct *inp_buff;    // buffer for cells arriving in the early slot phase
00176    inpstruct *inp_ptr;     //current position in inp_buff
00177 
00178    enum {InpBACK = -1};
00179    enum {SucData = 0, SucBACK = 1};
00180    
00181    int alarmed_early;
00182    int alarmed_late;
00183 
00184    // Connection parameter
00185    EWSXConnParam **connpar;
00186 
00187    root *ewsx;                  // pointer to ewsxcontrol
00188    int *pqlen;                  // pointer to the queue-length
00189    int qlen_local;              // local queue length
00190    int maxbuff;
00191    int epdThreshGlobal;         // when to start dropping frames
00192    int clpThreshGlobal;         // when to start dropping CLP==1 cells
00193    int PrioClpEpd;              // do not perform EPD for UBR CLP=0 cells
00194    int epdClp1;                 // perform EPD for VBR CLP=1 cells
00195    
00196    // WFQ-Parameter
00197    tim_typ spacTime;            // the central WFQ variable "Spacing Time"
00198    enum {spacTimeMax = 100000000};   // when to reset spacTime
00199    
00200    // Parameter for output bandwidth
00201    double TimeSendNext;
00202    double outdelta;
00203 
00204    int connected;
00205    int CellsPushedOut;
00206    
00207    int ReservedBuff;
00208    double ReservedBandwidth;
00209    double MaxBandwidth;
00210         
00211    // global ABR Param
00212    AbrParam abr;
00213    int AbrVciLast;   // last ABR data connection, if a BRMC-connection in the
00214                      // backward dir. is setup, this VCI is assumed to be
00215                      // the data vci
